Second best single player game I have ever played. If you haven't already got it get it now while its on sale.

Here's an interesting fact: you're not playing [Real Games] It's too expensive to [Play] this far down. We just take [Good Games] out of a room, freshen it up a little, and pump it back in. So you'll be breathing the same room full of [Good Game] for the rest of your life. I thought that was interesting.
How could you NOT recommend this game? Are there even people who haven't played it still out there?

This game is so amazing. The physics, the mechanism, the story, had me amazed. I REALLY RECCOMEND YOU TO BUY BOTH PORTAL AND PORTAL 2 when sale because it's fricking cheap! Please guys, just buy it already
este juego es muy divertido muy dinamico genial divertido

Portal 2 is one of the games that could be described as the personification of the word classic. It's a game that's still talked about and discussions take place even almost a decade after it's release. Personally the cooperative aspect was the most enjoyable for me but the singleplayer story line is absolutely amazing as well, the lifeless and hollow metal husk that is GLaDOS has won over our hearts instantaneously.

From gameplay, to story and writing, this game is a solid 10/10.

This game is very fun and creative, being better than any sequel I've ever played.  It is creative, mind testing, and very, very testing of your observation skills.  Spoiler:  The antagonist, GLaDOS becoming the protagonist's guide, and the protagonist's original guide, Wheatley becoming the antagonist is a very cool concept.  And the ending, oh my god.  The ending is like all your favorite movie endings put together squared.
Cara esse jogo é incrivel. A história, os puzzles, tudo simplesmente incrivel

Amazing gameplay, humor, soundtrack, writing, acting. I don't have anything to say that hasn't been said already. Just go play it. 

10/10. A must-have game.
I'd punch a baby for Portal 3.
this is big goodness of a game

很早就已经听说这款游戏，我记得家里现在还有一本掌机王sp（2011年的好像？2010？？）里面对于这款游戏赞不绝口（当年我也是个喜欢各种游戏的人电脑世界掌机王这种杂志买了一堆）说实话很有意思毕竟打折只有3块两代加起来才4块这不是白嫖是什么？？？？！！！！强烈推荐！！！！！！
PS:掌机王sp还推荐了苍翼默示录、恶魔城、（和稚子一起做游戏：）另外还有重返浣熊市的新篇章发售消息还有3ds销量不好爆冷的消息hhhh好怀念啊

yea the puzzles kept me intrested for a long time till well i got bored but i say it would be great for other people 
 i would play again :P
tis a good game fun and challenging
Simplemente uno de los mejores cooperativos de la historia

Les gens de chez Valve, on peut espérer un Portal 3 ou pas ? S'il vous plaît ? Avec le même moteur 3D, les mêmes graphismes, ça fera parfaitement l'affaire. Parce que bon, pour ceux qui l'auraient pas compris, Portal 2 est un chef d'oeuvre d'inventivité et d'intelligence, et il est tout simplement indispensable dans toute ludothèque qui se respecte. Comme Portal premier du nom d'ailleurs. Mais bon le 2 est tellement plus abouti. Mais il faut jouer au premier quand même avant, c'est mieux. Enfin bref, jouez-y.
Já conhecia o Portal 1, e gostei bastante do Portal 2 também, ainda mais com modo cooperativo.
One of the greatest games of all time

It is a really good game and for that price a nice deal. You dont need to pay anything extra like in CS:GO. Also map editing is inclueded and you dont need to install or pay extra for an SDK-Version. The grafic is more than good. When you zoom in into a small point, you anyway dont see any pixels. Thats different like in other games.
Also a point, you need to think in this game, whats hard for a lot of people, even when only 1% of all steam-user have a bigger IQ than 1. Inclueded me ;)
I just like this game, the story is interesting and all the other points are well solved from Valve. Such a nice game
Single player and coop are incredibly fun and well thought out. Outstanding game design and execution. 10/10
Yohohohohohoho löcher durch wand hahahah gehen
Эта игра - классика которую все играли в детстве. От перепрохождения этой игры получил много радости и хороших воспоминаний))
Co-op if they actually work with yeah is amazing

Portal 2 ist ein Spiel, welches den Vorgänger bei Weitem übertrifft.
Im Vergleich zum ersten Teil  haben wir hier eine ausgefüllte Storyline, die tief in die Geschichte Aperture Science 's reicht.
Neben den altbekannten Freunden (zum Beispiel den Androiden) haben wir auch einiges neues an Material, beispielweise diverse Gele oder Katapulte (ich möchte nicht zu viel verraten ;) ).

Portal 2 vereint eine wirklich gute Grafik, ein gutes Gameplay, nostalgische Musik und einen teilweise wirklich bissigen Humor wunderbar in einer Story, wie sie einem Puzzle - Game gerecht wird (Ich persönlich mochte die Story sehr :) ).
Ich kann dieses Spiel wirklich jedem weiterempfehlen.

Aber nun muss ich Schluss machen. Ich habe gerade gesehen, dass es eine Erweiterungsmod für dieses Spiel gibt... Ich muss zocken ;)

[Hmhmhmmm...
Still alive 
And believe me I am
Still alive
I'm doing science and I'm
Still alive
I feel fantastic and I'm
Still alive
While you're dying I'll be
Still alive
And when you're dead I will be
Still alive]

PS: Ich bereue es wirklich, dass ich mir das Spiel nicht schon vor Monaten gekauft habe.

Juego antiguo pero bueno.
 Es recomendable comprarlo? si. Es un juego muy bueno, Si vas a comprartelo estos lo que te vas a esperar:
- Graficos bonitos
- Puzzles donde tienes que tener algo de cerebro 
- Mecanicas buenas 
Si te lo vas a comprar por el co-op hazlo, Es muy bueno para jugar con amigos y es lo mas atractivo del juego
The funniest puzzle game with a great co-op mode! Also, you can create your own maps and share with community.
It's just great. I finished the story in 12 hours. The rest of my hours explain everything
